sentences.en: A cabinet maker must be a master craftsman.
sentences.cn: 家具木工必须是技艺高超的手艺人.

sentences.en: And only now does the craftsman, the deliverer, begin his.
sentences.cn: 只是到这时,工匠, 这位故事的助产士才开始他的工作.

sentences.en: Attention to detail is the hallmark of a fine craftsman.
sentences.cn: 能工巧匠的特点是一丝不苟.

sentences.en: Daedalus took refuge in Gretan Cnossus , where King Minos delighted to welcome so skilled a craftsman.
sentences.cn: 代达罗斯在克里特岛的克诺索斯避难.弥诺斯国王极为乐意地接纳了这位多才多艺的工匠.

sentences.en: He was an apprentice to a master craftsman.
sentences.cn: 他是一位能工巧匠的徒弟.

sentences.en: Morris intended to foster an art restoring the dignity of the craftsman.
sentences.cn: 莫里斯的目的在于扶植一种能恢复手工艺工人威望的艺术.

sentences.en: My grandfather learn shoe - make as an apprentice to a master craftsman.
sentences.cn: 作为一名演员,他是一位技艺高超的艺术家.

sentences.en: My grandfather learnt shoe - making as an apprentice to a master craftsman.
sentences.cn: 我祖父跟一位大师傅当学徒,学会了制鞋.

sentences.en: The craftsman is working up the mass of clay into a toy figure.
sentences.cn: 艺人把一团泥捏成玩具形状.

sentences.en: The cut of a diamond depends on the skill of its craftsman.
sentences.cn: 钻石切割靠的是工匠的技艺。

sentences.en: The spirit of craftsman in villas has been lost for so long!
sentences.cn: 别墅的工匠精神,丢失了很久!

sentences.en: The table in the kitchen was made by a local craftsman.
sentences.cn: 厨房里的桌子是本地一位工匠制作的。

sentences.en: This clock was fabricated by the finest craftsman in 1880.
sentences.cn: 这只钟是在1880年由最好的工匠制造的.

sentences.en: This good - natured craftsman built her a splendid palace on Cyprus.
sentences.cn: 这个善良的工匠在塞浦路斯岛上为她修建了一座辉煌的宫殿.

sentences.en: Toyota entered Nascar competition through the Craftsman Truck Series in 2004.
sentences.cn: 丰田进入全美赛车联合会竞赛是通过2004年的工匠卡车系列赛.

trans.tran_en: someone who is very skilled at a particular  craft
